actions.text: House Committee on House Administration Discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.
Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A resolution providing amounts from the contingent fund of the House for further expenses of investigations and studies by the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct in the second session of the Ninety-ninth Congress.

summary.text: Authorizes expenditures by the House Committee on Standards of Official Conduct for the second session of the 99th Congress, including the procurement of consultant services.

titles.title: A resolution providing amounts from the contingent fund of the House for further expenses of investigations and studies by the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct in the second session of the Ninety-ninth Congress.
